name: Soccer Stadiums Multiple Choice Quiz |   Soccer

questions.text: Which team plays at Carrow Road?
questions.explanation:
Norwich City.

	The home of the canaries.

questions.text: The Kop End is a famous section of which team's home ground?
The 2000 Olympic Games football final was played where?
questions.explanation:
Stadium Australia.

	Yes, strangely enough they played it before the marathon finished.

questions.text: Leeds United play at this ground?
Ibrox is the home of which Glasgow giant?
questions.explanation:
Rangers.

	Yes, the derby against Celtic at Ibrox is always a belter.

questions.text: The Scottish national team usually plays where?
questions.explanation:
Hampden Park.

	It's capacity used to exceed 100,000 but now only holds around 40,000.

questions.text: Where do the Lake Albert Sharks play?
questions.explanation:
Rawlings Park.

	Most of the time they do, unless it is flooded.

questions.text: The Australia v Iran world cup qualifier, 2nd leg, was played where?
questions.explanation:
Melbourne Cricket Ground.

	The less that game is talked about the better.

questions.text: Which of these stadiums has a home team that plays in blue?
questions.explanation:
Stamford Bridge.

	Chelsea play in blue at Stamford Bridge.
